items.title: 1,000-fold gain for early BNB investor as token tops $1,000
items.excerpt: BNB surged to a fresh all-time high of $1,005, turning an early $1,000 stake into $1,000,000 over eight years for at least one investor. On-chain analytics and market commentators point to a mix of native utility, institutional flows and broader macro momentum behind the rally.
